description:
Minor material amendment to vary condition 2 (approved plans)  of planning permission reference P091813 (appeal reference APP/V5570/A/10/2129052/NWF) for the Demolition of 465 (excluding east elevation/facade) and 465A Caledonian Road and the erection of a part six storey, part eight storey and part 11 storey building, plus basement for student accommodation, comprising 346 bed spaces, common room and administrative facilities, office accommodation (Class B1[a] 589 sq.m) and ground floor commercial uses (Class A1/A3/A5 [671 sq.m] ), together with outdoor amenity space and landscaping. The amendments to the plans are:
A] relocation of the laundry room on the first floor in the southern block to the ground floor in place of one of the store rooms
B] Replacement of the laundry on the first floor of the southern block with one additional studio unit 
C] Reduction in the cycle  storage at lower ground floor level 58 spaces and replacement of the space with three studios
D] Deletion of three store-rooms on the ground floor and their replacement with a cycle storage area providing parking for 58 cycles
decision_conditions:
A scheme for sound insulation and noise control measures shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to any superstructure works commencing on site. The sound insulation and noise control measures shall achieve the following internal noise targets (in line with BS 8233:1999):
Bedrooms (23.00-07.00 hrs) 35 dB LAeq and 45 dB Lmax (fast)
Kitchens and utility rooms (07.00-23.00 hrs) 45 dB LAeq
The measures to achieve these targets shall be implemented prior to the first occupation of the student accommodation.
